newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products mostly weak, fuel up, mogas falls.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products mostly weak, fuel up, mogas falls.

text.p: NWE oil products were mostly weaker on Friday, traders said.
Gasoline was sharply weaker as NYMEX gasoline futures broke through technical support. Eurograde barges traded in the afternoon at $196/$197 fob ARA.
Naphtha was slightly weaker with crude, but an industry function stifled business.
Gas oil eased on softer benchmark IPE futures. Heating oil barges were done at June IPE +75 cents fob ARA for storage material for second half delivery.
